isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 9200 9300 9400 MODELS BUILT AFTER JANUARY 1, 1995 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - GENERAL INFORMATION - 1994 - TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: The electronic engines in this service section will to some extent diagnose the engine control systems and provide diagnostic codes that can be read through the diagnostic connector, using electronic service tools. Cummins and Caterpillar have specific electronic service tools (EST) for their engines. The M.P.S.I. Prolink EST is the Detroit Diesel service tool, and with different cartridges can be used with Caterpillar and Cummins engines. Each Prolink cartridge has an operation manual for using the EST.

The chapters also include diagnostic charts to assist in troubleshooting specific International circuits. The charts in each section either address specific symptoms or provide an orderly check of the complete system. When using the charts, first read the system description. Then refer to the appropriate circuit diagram in the chapter while using the chart.
